mapper.insert: insert into user_account (ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_PASSWD, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_ADDRESS_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_ADDRESS_LOAD, ACCOUNT_PHONE, ACCOUNT_EMAIL_ID, ACCOUNT_EMAIL_DOMAIN, ACCOUNT_IS_SELLER, ACCOUNT_JOIN_DATE) values (#{accountId}, #{accountPasswd}, #{accountName}, #{accountAddressNumber}, #{accountAddressLoad}, #{accountPhone}, #{accountEmailId}, #{accountEmailDomain}, #{accountIsSeller},sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_account where ACCOUNT_ID = #{userid}
